product_name: Louis Garneau Perfo LT Power Bike Bib Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and well ventilated, the men's Louis Garneau Perfo LT Power Bike Bib Shorts are designed to fit comfortably yet support your leg muscles on those long, hard stretches. 12-panel ergonomic fit and stretch trim on the bib straps add comfort. Powerband compressive cuffs reduce lower leg pressure, provide support and won't restrict circulation. Easy-reach gel storage pocket at thigh; 1 back pocket. Flat lock seams eliminate irritation and reduce chafing. Louis Garneau Perfo LT Power Bike Bib Shorts have back and bottom reflective accents. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and well ventilated, the men's Louis Garneau Perfo LT Power Bike Bib Shorts are designed to fit comfortably yet support your leg muscles on those long, hard stretches.
